headline: Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies (NYSE:WAB) Sees 11% Price Dip Over Last Month Amid Trade Tensions
summary: Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies (NYSE:WAB) saw its share price decline by 10.5% over the past month, aligning with the broader market downturn highlighted by significant drops in major indexes due to global trade concerns. The recently announced tariffs between the U.S. and China have heightened fears of an economic slowdown, impacting investor sentiment across various sectors. While Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies itself did not announce any major company-specific news during this...
